name: Lt. Governor Brian Benjamin

name: Lt. Governor Brian Benjamin
tweet: Today, New York makes history as the FIRST state to convene an interstate taskforce to stop the flow of illegal guns.   Join us in our fight against gun violence by tuning in here:

name: Lt. Governor Brian Benjamin
tweet: I mourn alongside all New Yorkers as we face the loss of Officer Wilbert Mora, a fallen hero. We lift up his family and loved ones as they grieve the unthinkable. His legacy of courage and compassion will live on in the communities he helped better through his service.

name: Lt. Governor Brian Benjamin
tweet: We need to intercept these guns and apprehend the channels they pass through. That‚Äôs where the Interstate Task Force on Illegal Guns comes in. I look forward to Wednesday‚Äôs working with over 50 law enforcement officials from 9 states to stop gun violence in New York and beyond.

name: Lt. Governor Brian Benjamin
tweet: We don‚Äôt make guns in New York City. So what we‚Äôre seeing is an influx of guns traveling illegally into our state‚Äîbeing bought, sold, and traded‚Äîand those guns making it into the hands of the wrong people. Over 1,070 illegal guns were recovered last year.

name: Lt. Governor Brian Benjamin
tweet: We know that @nyspolice leadership will be paramount to stopping gun violence. In our budget, @GovKathyHochul and I have dedicated over $31M specifically to state police‚Äîto work more closely with local enforcement and to staff up on experts who understand what we‚Äôre up against.

name: Lt. Governor Brian Benjamin
tweet: The 49th anniversary of #RoeVWade serves as a harrowing reminder that women‚Äôs rights are on the chopping block nationally.  But, in New York, women are not‚Äîand never will be‚Äîsecond-class citizens. @GovKathyHochul and I stand ready to defend all New Yorkers‚Äô reproductive rights.

name: Lt. Governor Brian Benjamin
tweet: Gun violence is a public health crisis. @GovKathyHochul and I are working in lockstep with @NYCMayor to make our streets safer for everyone: our officers, our children, our seniors, our neighbors. We will leave no stone unturned until we root this out once and for all.

name: Lt. Governor Brian Benjamin
tweet: Tonight, 2 NYPD officers were shot while bravely responding to the call of duty. One will not be making it home, and the other is in critical condition. My thoughts are with the loved ones of both heroes.

name: Lt. Governor Brian Benjamin
tweet: I stand with @GovKathyHochul. Hate has no place in NY‚Äînot on our streets, in our communities, in our schools, or on social media. We have zero tolerance for language that incites violence of any kind. I commend @sunyesf leadership for quickly denouncing the acts that transpired.

name: Lt. Governor Brian Benjamin
tweet: Today, a born and bred Bronxite went above and beyond to help the borough that raised her.  @iamcardib, thank you for your generosity. Amidst intense grief and suffering, your selflessness gives New Yorkers everywhere a reason to be proud of their roots.
